riff.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a repeated series of notes in popular or jazz music
riff.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a piece of speech in which someone talks about a subject in an entertaining way that does not seem planned
riff.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He goes off on a riff about the problems of being middle-aged.
riff.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to play different notes related to the main tune in popular or jazz music
riff.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He was riffing on his guitar.
riff.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to talk about a subject in an entertaining way that does not seem planned
riff.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: During her show, she riffs about everything from her family to global warming.
